div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:
Implementation guide for Israel Core FHIR

description.value: Implementation guide for Israel Core FHIR
Adds several Israel-specific extensions, plus geocode to the Address datatype

A coded representation of the city, town or settlement
Extension: Israel Health Management Organizations (קופות חולים)
Extension: The name of a parent

Extension: Immigration information for patient - for the purpose of this extension - immigration is an international movement of a person to a destination country in order to settle as permanent resident
Extension: Qualification Practice
Extension: Statistical Area
City classification according to the Israeli Postal Company city-symbol coding system
A list of category codes for conditions for the IL Core
A list of codes for conditions for the IL Core

name.value: IL Core Patient Relationship Type codes

description.value: A set of codes that can be used to indicate the relationship between a Patient and a Related Person.

name.value: סוג מוסד לפי רישוי משרד הבריאות

description.value: סוג מוסד לפי רישוי משרד הבריאות - הרוב המכריע נמצא בפרסום המאגר של רישוי מוסדות של משרד הבריאות

name.value: קוד מוצר או שירות על פי משרד הבריאות

description.value: קוד שירותים רפואיים , כולל שירותים באשפוז, שירותים אמבולטוריים, רפואת שיניים ובריאות הנפש Codes for medical services. Note that while this code system closely resembles CPT and includes a large number of CPT codes, there are some additional codes that are not covered by CPT and, more importantly, some cases where CPT codes are remapped and have different semantic meanings (e.g., code #28899 has two different meanings in CPT and in MoH codesytem). Therefore, despite apparent resemblance, this code system MUST NOT be treated as CPT.
A country specific URI for passport numbers

A number representing the city symbol (4-digits) + statistical area (3 digits) in settelment. 7 digits long. Full CBS number conatins two parts: City symbol + statistical number. E.g.: Jerusalem (3000) 113 area produces -> 3000113
Codes for cities in Israel
Israeli Identifier number issued for all citizens and permanent residents. A nine-digit number including a check-digit
